Comment: Download or view your Azure billing invoice and daily usage data

This deployment will use NFS, Microsoft SQL, and smaller autoscale web frontend VM sku (1 core) that'll give faster deployment time (less than 30 minutes) and requires only 2 VM cores currently that'll fit even in a free trial Azure subscription.

This maximal deployment will use Gluster (for high availability, adding 2 VMs for a Gluster cluster), MySQL with highest SKU, redis cache, elastic search (3 VMs), and pretty large storage sizes (both data disks and DB).
Accept or reject terms for a given publisher id(Publisher), offer id(Product) and plan id(Name). Please use Get-AzureRmMarketplaceTerms to get the agreement terms.
The Add-AzureADGroupMember cmdlet adds a member to a group. e.g. publisher: microsoft-ads; product: windows-data-science-vm; name: windows-data-science-vm
This Ubuntu Server template have TensorFlow on GPUs using N-series Azure VM instances
